sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SALIANT, in fortification, denotes projecting. There are two kinds of angles, the one ſaliant, which have their point outwards; the other re-entering, which have their points inwards.
Saliant, Salient, or Saillant, in heraldry, is applied to a lion, or other beaſt, when its fore-legs are raiſed in a leaping poſture.
